item.title: Genshin Impact Confirms Event Banners for Version 5.8
item.description:
Genshin Impact has confirmed that Ineffa and Citlali will feature in the first half of Version 5.8, while Chasca and Mualani will headline the second half of the update. There is a lot to look forward to in Version 5.8, between a new zone, the Summer Event, new outfits, the Archon Quest, but Genshin Impact has always been about its characters, and Ineffa is set to join its ever-growing cast as a 5-Star Electro Polearm.

There are plenty of things that Ineffa has going for her. Apart from Beidou, she's the first proper Electro Shield character, and her ability kit is intuitive and easy to use. While her numbers aren't as ambitious as those of Escoffier, Ineffa has the makings of a 5-Star that will only get better with time. Version 6.0 will introduce a dedicated Artifact Set for Ineffa in Genshin Impact , and Nod-Krai is set to further expand Lunar Elemental Reactions.

As revealed in the latest developer livestream and shared on social media, the Event Wishes for Version 5.8 will have Ineffa and Citlali in the first half of the update, while the second half will feature Mualani and Chasca. For an update that is meant to usher in Nod-Krai while closing off the Natlan era of Genshin Impact , the Event Banners are in perfect conformity to that vision. Citlali, Mualani, and Chasca are all due for a rerun, leaving Varesa the only Natlan character in Genshin Impact without a rerun by Nod-Krai.

Genshin Impact: Version 5.8 Event Wishes

While HoYoverse hasn't revealed any 4-Star characters in the lineup, there are a few logical choices to consider. Given that Bennett is receiving a new Genshin Impact skin in Version 5.8, there is a decent chance that he'll show up on the Event Banners in the second half. Furthermore, Version 5.8 was datamined to feature Xingqiu and Fischl, who will likely be placed in the first half alongside Ineffa. Unfortunately, the other three 4-Stars are anyone's guess.

As for the Weapon Banners, Chasca's Bow and Citlali's Catalyst will likely be the main draw. That being said, with the reveal of Lauma as Nod-Krai's second playable character, it may be prudent to save up on Primogems until fans know more about the full lineup in Version 6.0. Perhaps the smartest investment for the upcoming Genshin Impact region will be to choose at least one Lunar Reaction and build a team around it. Version 5.8 is set to launch on July 30, 2025, which will also mark the beginning of beta testing for Nod-Krai.

item.title: Valve Confirms Reason for Removing Adult Steam Games
item.description:
Valve has recently confirmed that it removed some adult games from Steam to appease payment processors. Some gamers were already speculating that this was the reason behind the recent change in Steam’s content guidelines, and the statement clarified that payment companies contacted the popular PC gaming platform and asked for the removal of certain titles.

Steam recently changed its content guidelines, stating that games that violated the standards set by the platform’s payment processors, banks, and networks would be removed. Soon after the change, the platform was criticized by gamers due to the worryingly vague new guidelines, as the platform suggested that developers should avoid publishing “certain kinds of adult-only content,” but didn’t provide specifics.

Now, in an official response to media outlets such as Eurogamer, Steam explained that it changed its rules because the company was recently notified that certain games violated the “rules and standards set forth by our payment processors and their related card networks and banks.” According to Steam, the loss of these payment methods would prevent customers from purchasing other titles, so the decision was made to remove these adult games from the platform. Information from SteamDB indicates that over 100 games have been removed from the platform recently, with many of them being "incest-themed." Most of these titles are adult-only Steam games and are likely victims of this change in moderation. At the time, SteamDB’s profile hinted that the removal could be linked to PayPal, as people from certain regions were no longer able to use the payment method to purchase games on the platform for around five days, but this was never confirmed.

Valve Removed Some Adult Games From Steam Due to Payment Processors

At the moment, it’s still unclear how this will affect other Steam games focused on dating, for example, if they include any adult content. While many titles have been removed from the store, Steam has a huge number of titles focused on adult content, and most of them were not affected. While some of them could be affected in the future, it’s likely that many will not. It’s also unclear if these guidelines set by payment processors will only affect games in some “niches,” such as the “incest-themed” titles that were spotted by SteamDB.

In any case, not many games receive adult-only ratings on Steam, so it’s safe to assume that most releases will be free from the changes in the guidelines. However, multiple gamers have expressed concern on social media over these changes, as they may empower payment processors to censor content that they would deem controversial in any way.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Fantastic Fortunes Rewards and Milestones
item.description:
The Reed's Realm solo event is over, but Monopoly GO is keeping the Fantastic Four fun going with a brand-new solo event called Fantastic Fortunes. It began on July 18 and will last for two days and three hours, ending on July 21 .

If you check the timer on the Fantastic Treasures minigame, you’ll notice it also ends on July 21. That’s why Fantastic Fortunes is super important. It gives you the most tokens for the minigame right now. If you complete all the Fantastic Fortunes milestones, you can collect almost 200 minigame tokens . But that’s not all, because players will also earn a bunch of free dice rolls and sticker packs for the Summer Escape album. Want to know exactly what rewards you can get? Keep reading for the full list of Fantastic Fortunes Monopoly GO milestones and rewards.

Fantastic Fortunes Monopoly GO Rewards and Milestones

Fantastic Fortunes Monopoly GO Rewards Summary

Fantastic Fortunes is spread over 62 milestones . Here's a breakdown of the most lucrative rewards that you can earn in this solo event:

  • Top Reward of 5,500 Dice
  • A Three-Star Sticker Pack at the 26th Milestone
  • A 15-Minute Color Wheel Boost at the 44th Milestone
  • A 40-Minute Mega Heist at the 50th Milestone
  • A 15-Minute Builder's Bash at the 18th Milestone
  • A Total of 17,465 Dice Rolls
  • A Total of 199 Tokens for Fantastic Treasures

Fantastic Fortunes Monopoly GO will only last for two days, so act fast if you want to claim all the fantastic rewards.

How to Get Points in Fantastic Fortunes Monopoly GO

For the Fantastic Fortunes event, players should aim to land on the Chance, Tax, and Utility spaces of their boards. Here's what they will earn from every landing:

  • Chance: Two Points
  • Tax: Three Points
  • Utility: Two Points.

If you want to earn more points faster, try using a higher roll multiplier. But don’t go too high unless you have a lot of dice saved up. Otherwise, you will run out quickly.

item.title: Sea of Thieves: Legends Unleashed Event Guide
item.description:
The ongoing battle between Captain Flameheart and the Pirate Lord continues in Sea of Thieves ' Legends Unleashed, a two-week event that sees both sides rallying their forces. The Pirate Lord is calling for defenders of the pirate way of life to unite and strike back against the relentless Flameheart and his growing army of followers, whereas the latter won't let the attack go unnoticed. Running from July 17 to July 31 , there are various ways you can take in the event, whether you're a dedicated Athena's Fortune fan or a Reaper through and through who wants to let the flame burn.

Participating in this time-limited Sea of Thieves event can also net you some neat rewards for your efforts and to mark the occasion. It's also one not to miss if you're trying to level up your Athena's Fortune reputation or seek to rise through the ranks of the Reaper's Bones. This Sea of Thieves Legends Unleashed event guide details all the ways you can participate and the rewards you can earn, with different themes for weeks one and two.

How to Take Part in the Legends Unleashed Event

To take part in Sea of Thieves ' Legends Unleashed event, you'll need to set sail on the High Seas anytime between July 17 to July 31 (10am UTC) . Week one of the event is themed around Athena's Fortune, and week two is themed around the Reaper's Bones. However, during both weeks of the event, you can complete daily goals for Athena's Fortune as found in the event section of the Pirate Log tab .

It's not possible to complete daily goals for either Athena's Fortune or the Reapers as part of the event in Safer Seas.

During week two of the event, from July 24 to July 31, there are also daily goals to complete for the Reaper's Bones .

Legendary Daily Goals for Athena's Fortune (Legends Unleashed Week One)

During week one of Legends Unleashed , you can complete daily Athena's Fortune-themed goals that unlock each day of the event, one at a time. The nature of each goal varies, but many involve different ways of tracking down and selling Athena's Fortune treasure. Completing daily Athena's Fortune-themed goals rewards you with double gold and Athena's Fortune reputation when handing treasure in to either the Mysterious Stranger in the tavern or the Sovereigns at any Sea of Thieves outpost, along with Seasonal Renown and Doubloons.

Altogether, there are eight Legendary daily goals in total to complete once unlocked, as outlined in the table below:

Date Unlocked

Legendary Daily Goal

How to Complete

July 17

Complete Legendary Message in a Bottle Voyages

Complete x3 Legendary Message in a Bottle voyages.

July 17

Smouldering Plunder

Hand in an Ashen Chest of Legends.

July 18

Fortune Favours the Bold

Unlock a Fort of Fortune vault. During the Legends Unleashed event, there is a chance of an Ashen Mega Stash containing an Ashen Chest of Legends appearing in Ashen Mega Stashes Skeleton Fort.

July 19

Light the Way

Use a Skull of Destiny to activate the Fort of the Damned (such as via A Legendary Search for the Skull of Destiny voyage).

July 20

Piercing the Veil

Complete the Legend of the Veil voyage.

July 21

Bounty Hunter

Complete a Legendary Skeleton Bounty Search voyage.

July 22

Compass Conundrum

Complete a Legendary Skeleton Riddle Quest.

July 23

Alluring Artifacts

Complete a Legendary Treasure Map Search voyage.

While most of the above goals require you to be a Pirate Legend , any player of any level can find Legendary Messages in Bottle quests in purple bottles on beaches randomly throughout the world. These give you treasure maps leading to Athena's Fortune treasure, with possible Athena loot such as the lucrative Chest of Legends. Look for the purple glint along shorelines to spot these using your spyglass.

Legendary Daily Goals for Reaper's Resurgence (Legends Unleashed Week Two)

During the second week of Sea of Thieves ' Legends Unleashed event from July 24, you can earn double gold and reputation for selling Athena's Fortune treasure items to the Reapers at the Reapers' Hideout . You can also earn 10x gold and reputation if you sell Athena's Fortune Emissary Flags to them.

Additionally, there are also eight daily goals to complete for the Reapers' Bones (Reaper's Gauntlet of Goals) as detailed in the table below, with each unlocking daily from July 24 and varying in nature, such as defeating the Burning Blade or cashing in skulls:

Date Unlocked

Reaper's Daily Goal

How to Complete

July 24

Hand in Athena's Fortune Treasure

Hand in Athena's Fortune Treasure to the Reaper's Hideout.

July 24

Reaper Readiness

Buy and wear the Reaper's Bones Costume as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.

July 25

Break the Seal

Break the Seal on a Chest of Bones obtained as part of the Followers of the Flame Reaper voyage.

July 26

Pledge Your Allegiance

Defeat the Burning Blade and pledge your crew to it.

July 27

Reap the Rewards

Complete any Reaper's Bones voyage.

July 28

Ritual Rewards

Hand in any skull to the Servant of the Flame (located at the Reaper's Hideout).

July 29

Unrivalled Reaper

Reach Grade 5 while representing the Reaper's Bones as an Emissary.

July 30

Loyal Offering

Hand in Reaper Chests and Bounties to the Servant of the Flame.

During the two-week event, Reapers can also still search for Athena Treasure to cash in at the Reaper's Hideout by finding Legendary Messages in Bottles and completing Skeleton Forts/Forts of Fortune for the chance of Ashen Mega Stashes. However, it's worth noting that the daily Reaper goals only begin unlocking on July 24.

Legends Unleashed Event Rewards in Sea of Thieves

In addition to the possible gold, doubloons, Seasonal Renown, and reputation gains for completing various daily goals, there are also specific rewards you can unlock during the Legends Unleashed event, namely two decorative ship trinkets , as follows:

Legends Unleashed Reward

How to Unlock

Victory to the Fortunate Trinket

Complete x3 Legendary Message in a Bottle quests (Legendary Daily Goal).

Victory to the Flame Trinket

Sell x3 Athena's Fortune treasure items to the Reapers' Bones (Reaper's Gauntlet of Goals Daily Goal).

Lastly, it's worth noting you can only unlock the Victory of the Flame Trinket in week 2 of the event when the corresponding daily goal becomes available, plus any pirate of any level can take part in any of the daily Reaper's Gauntlet of Goals. Players siding with Athena's Fortune can also continue to earn double gold and reputation throughout the two weeks, whereas Reapers can cash in Athena loot for double gold and reputation during the second week.

item.title: 8 Unique Open-World Games That Were Innovative At The Time, Ranked
item.description: Open-world games need to be at the forefront of innovation so that fans don't get put off when they check out by-the-numbers entries in the genre. As such, the best open-world titles around know how to draw fan attention by trying something different. Today, we will be ranking the best open-world titles that tried something new.
